main:
^What do you think you're doing here just walkin in to the Mayor's house like you own the place?

^Do you have an appointment or what?


^You're lookin for the Mayor?

^So you can interview him about all the weird vibes around the city?

^And ask him about the cave outside town?



^So what I'm hearin is that you don't have an appointment.

^That's a shame. I can't call the Mayor down from upstairs if you don't have an appointment.

^Don't even think about trying to get up there yourself!

end
